content.description: Sit down low in the small cave feature at the base. Work a few big moves to gain the almost vertical crack. Follow the crack using lie backs up and slightly right topping out on the apex of the block.
content.location: middle of the block. This problem cuts out right slightly to the apex

content.description: Variation to Slot Pockets V6. Sit down low in the small cave feature at the base. Work a few big moves to gain the almost vertical crack. Cut out left and follow slots to the lip. Mantle over lip.
content.location: to the left of Slot Pockets V6. Variation.

content.description: The slots block holds 2 problems on it. Both are worth checking out and should probably be in the top 10 problems to do well you visit this area. As if this block was created for climbers it follows finely sculpted seams up a steep face. Both lines are obvious when facing this boulder.
